item.title: Liquid Computing at GDG Palermo - January 2025
item.description:
When Marco Martorana asked me to speak at GDG Palermo on a topic of my choice, I had a moment of hesitation. I wanted to choose a subject that was not only interesting for the audience but also something I was truly passionate about. After some reflection, I decided to talk about Liquid Computing, a concept I had recently explored in-depth for some articles published on TheRedCode.

You can read my articles on this topic here: Liquid Computing: Optimization and Fluidity for Kubernetes.

item.title: Intro Liquid Computing
item.description:
In my article for TheRedCode, I introduce the concept of Liquid Computing, an innovative paradigm that aims to integrate and optimize resources between cloud and edge computing in a fluid and dynamic way. Through this analysis, I explore the architectures underlying liquid computing, illustrating how this new approach can revolutionize the management of digital infrastructures by enhancing efficiency, scalability, and system resilience.

The article focuses on flexible resource management mechanisms and the interaction between various processing layers, highlighting how liquid computing could represent the future of technological innovation for professionals in IT and emerging technologies.

item.title: What is Computer RAM and What Are Its Functions
item.description: Imagine breathing life into the beating heart of your computer: RAM, or random access memory, is what allows every application to operate smoothly and responsively. In this article, originally published on Geopop, I explore in detail the essential role of this component, unveiling its technical secrets and illustrating how the various types of RAM can influence your system’s everyday performance. Through practical examples and in-depth insights, you’ll discover why every byte counts and how to optimize your computing environment.

item.title: The History of Robotics: From Early Inventions to the Frontiers of Artificial Intelligence
item.description:
A fascinating journey through time, where human ingenuity transformed simple machines into sophisticated intelligent systems.

In this article that I wrote for Geopop, I retrace the fundamental milestones of robotics, from the earliest mechanical inventions to the modern applications that intertwine robotics and artificial intelligence. With historical anecdotes, critical analysis, and reflections on the future, this piece will offer you a comprehensive overview of an ever-evolving field, highlighting its ethical and social implications.

item.title: Controlling Robots with Your Mind? It's Possible with Brain-Computer Interfaces (BCI)
item.description:
It almost feels like exploring a new frontier where science fiction and reality converge…

This article, which I had the pleasure of writing for Geopop, guides you into the world of brain-computer interfaces, explaining how advances in neuroscience and engineering are enabling brain signals to be transformed into digital commands for controlling robots and devices. Through case studies and insights into the technological and ethical challenges, you’ll discover how this innovation is revolutionizing the way we interact with technology.

item.title: The History of Blockchain Technology: From Its Origins to Its Current and Future Uses
item.description:
From the mysterious origins of Bitcoin to the applications that are transforming sectors such as finance and logistics, this article that I wrote for Geopop takes you on a journey to discover blockchain. Using clear language, I analyze the principles underlying this technology, highlighting how decentralization and cryptography can ensure transparency and security in every transaction.

This analysis combines history, innovation, and a forward-looking perspective, designed to stimulate deep reflections on the potential of this revolutionary tool.

item.title: What is the Digital Wallet and How It Works: The Types of Digital Wallets and Their Future
item.description: In the world of digital payments, digital wallets are emerging as revolutionary tools for managing money. In this article, published on Geopop, I explore in depth the various types of digital wallets, illustrating how they work, the security measures in place, and the future prospects that will make them increasingly central to everyday transactions. With an approach that combines theory and practical examples, the piece will provide you with the tools to understand how the evolution of digital payments is transforming our relationship with money. I am proud to participate in Geopop’s mission, contributing to making innovative and highly relevant topics accessible.

item.title: The Leonardo Supercomputer: What It Is, Its Features, and What It Is Used For
item.description: Enter the world of high technology with the Leonardo Supercomputer, a computing giant that is revolutionizing scientific research and technological innovation. In this article, which I had the pleasure of writing for Geopop, I analyze Leonardo’s technical characteristicsâ€”from its incredible computational power to its applications in fields such as climate simulation, biomedical modeling, and beyond. Through a detailed narrative, you will discover how this tool is opening new perspectives to tackle the challenges of the future.

item.title: The Big Tech Crisis: Why Are They All Conducting Mass Layoffs?
item.description: In an era of economic and technological transformations, the major companies in the sector are facing difficult times, with mass layoffs and radical restructurings. This article, published on Geopop, offers an in-depth analysis of the dynamics that have led to this wave of cuts, examining the economic, strategic, and market factors influencing the Big Tech landscape. Through data, testimonies, and critical reflection, the piece invites you to understand the consequences of these changes on the future of innovation and work.

item.title: Generative AI: A Technological Revolution in Progress
item.description:
Generative AI is rapidly emerging as one of the most fascinating and promising technologies of our time. But what exactly is it, and how does it work? In simple terms, it is a form of artificial intelligence capable of creating new and original content using machine learning algorithms.

The generated content can span various fields, including music, art, design, and even writing. In this article, we will explore how Generative AI is being used today, its potential impact on the job market and industry, and discuss the implications of this emerging technology.

item.title: How I'm Using My IT Skills Against the Covid-19 Pandemic
item.description:
